casebody.data:
Rebecca LAMPERT, Appellee, v. JOHN HANCOCK MUTUAL LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant. No. 104. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 27, 1939. Oeland & Kuhn, of New York City (George W. Riley, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Forrest S. Chilton, of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment, 28 F.Supp. 142, affirmed.
